single-action: `CLICK` the 'Terminal' icon to open a shell

`TYPE` find ~/Downloads -type f -size +500M -atime +90 -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' f; do size=$(stat -c%s "$f"); mtime=$(date -d @$(stat -c%Y "$f") --iso-8601=seconds); sha=$(sha256sum "$f" | awk '{print $1}'); echo "\"$f\",$size,$mtime,$sha" >> "$outfile"; done
`TYPE` echo 'Done: manifest at ~/Desktop/old_downloads_manifest.csv and archive at ~/Desktop/Old_Downloads_Archive.tgz'
